extension.name: Brute Force Stop Package
extension.author: Bernhard Froehler
extension.description:
Brute Force Stop Package successfully installed!

This package contains all extensions constituting the Brute Force Stop (bfstop) functionality. It provides means to avert Brute-Force-Attacks on your Joomla-Installation.

Don't forget to configure and publish the "System - Brute Force Stop" plugin after installation!

For a list of all currently blocked IP addresses (and the chance to unblock them), go to "Components" - "Brute Force Stop Administration"

If you have any questions or problems, please visit the project site on github.
In case you want to uninstall Brute Force Stop, please use the Package to uninstall all extensions at once!
